column4: I'm not getting this... Here's a concrete example.  I just installed 'redis-server' package.  It created an entry i n /etc/init.d/redis-server.  How would I enable/disable this on startup?
also check if it has an entry in /etc/init/
that means it's not using upstart but the old school sysv
ubuntu removed service management a while ago - it still exists in other distros
